website_summaries.verdict: Pretty products and packaging makes the experience a little more relaxing.
pros: Users love the 2-quart stainless steel bucket that never seems to rust
Every purchase includes a detailed instructional eBook
High-quality materials are free of BPA and phthalates
cons: One of the more expensive kits on the market

customer_reviews.title: All you need
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Kit. You get alot for your money here. Nice materials. I used this for the first time today and now I realize why I could never retain my enemas with my other bucket. I have another basic bucket and basic hose but the liquid/coffee went too fast inside because it did not have the hose clamp that traps the liquid. It poured way too fast and I would immediately have to evacuate. My kit came with everything pictured with a nice detailed instruction book. That was a nice feature. So far so good. Glad I invested in this since the other one made me not want to do the coffee enema.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Completely unexpected
customer_reviews.text: For years, I've used the plastic buckets. I always bulked at the price of the metal one because it seemed like a pretty simple function so I couldn't justify the price. I decided to just go for it and buy it one day because I am really limiting the amount of plastic I buy due to environmental concerns... This really was a completely different experience. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be without this product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m In love with this kit. It comes with everything you need to get started if you are new to the enema world. Step by steps instructions on what to do and how to do it properly, which is very important! Don’t be afraid, I was afraid and hesitated a while before working the nerve up to do my first at home enema. All for no reason! It went smooth and the clean up was easy peasy. Definitely recommend this kit to anyone! Oh yea, I also feel a lot better since doing my own enemas! It has regulated me and helped other health issues disappear as well by cleaning my gut out!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Foster

customer_reviews.title: Bucket is too light, better options available
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but the bucket isn’t heavy enough and therefore, prone to tipping and spilling mid-enema which is the last thing you want. I’ve been doing enemas for years and never had a spill until I got this bucket. It just isn’t heavy enough. Seemed promising but I went back to seeking health after three unfortunate spills... Coffee enemas are one of the best things you can do for your health!!
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: ayerveda protocol. great product
customer_reviews.text: Ayerveda protocols include colon cleansing to help promote detox and this is a hygenic package and better for the environment than the disposable. on amazon you can get quality herbs powdered to add to the colon cleanse. helps get rid of heavy metals and especially good if you have autonomic issues digesting.
customer_reviews.author: Educated Consumer NY FL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I chose this product over the others. I have reviewed and researched and I am very pleased with my choice. I bought this because I changed my life style to be healthier. I did a liver detox and needed to do 3 days of flushing. Step by step instructions, easy to put together and clean. Customer service reached out the day I ordered it and made me feel appreciated. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used this enema kit once and that was for a coffee enema. I had no problems using the bucket and tubing. I really like that it came with two different types of shutoff valves, a variety of enema tips, bucket lid to keep solutions warm, extra parts, and carrying bag. The tubing is very study yet flexible. Only negative was there is no measuring lines on the inside nor the outside of the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Leaky mess
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months and only a few uses its a leaky mess. As you can see, the ring to insure no leaking during use separated and expanded. I tried to push it back in with no luck. It's a great kit and I really wanted to like this. But the main component (the bucket) is useless. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Great as a componant to a herb press after making tinctures.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as part on my herb press. I make herbal tinctures and infusions and the hardest part is squeezing out the herb matter when its done. This bucket and tubing has made it so much easier. The welding is clean and well done so it is easy to clean when done. the tubing has held up well to multiple washings. The canister is made with steel that has held up to being smashed with a few tones of pressure. It has not deformed at all or stained. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fallingfast

customer_reviews.title: I would deffently recommened to users
customer_reviews.text: It gets finger prints. But it is nice. The clamp is great. Easy to change out hoses and end pieces. The directions and easy to understand and very durable book. The douche is great! easy to hold and has comfortable attachments. Easy to clean. The box is pretty sturdy.. so you could either put back in there or put it in the nifty bag that came with the products.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Still deciding....
customer_reviews.text: Use the longer multi-holed tip that is slightly bulbous, it gets the best flow. There is no hole at the end of the other tips, only on the side which restricts flow after insertion since it's pressed against the anus wall on the side of the tip. I'm not sure how good a deal this is vs the clear BPA free plastic bucket which has measurements on the side, a thinner hose, and has worked great for me in the past.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal enema kit! It comes with everything you'd ever need and it is sanitary, high quality and easy to clean. I love the stainless steel bucket as opposed to a bag (ew!). This was a comfortable process and came with great directions to help a first-time user. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jensen Family

customer_reviews.title: Can't replace the first time use leaking yellow flow valve without returning the entire unit.
customer_reviews.text: The main attraction to me was the ability to slow the flow. The valve used to do so, leaks profusely. Most of my solution was on the floor before I could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Aure

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The metal that connects the bucket to the spout isn’t properly sealed. I can’t use it with out making a huge mess with coffee leaking everywhere from the thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: First time using it and it has rust in the bottom. That sounds healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Fast and Easy to Santize
customer_reviews.text: Ive been doing Coffee Enemas for about a year now, but with the old traditional rubber kits. Not having much experience with different enema kits. I thought it was supposed to be a little uncomfortable. But this Medisential Stainless Steel kit is very comfortable, fast and easy to sanitize. I'd highly recommend this kit. Im very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chef LaDawn

customer_reviews.title: A greater starter kit for coffee enemas
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with quality of this product. From the 2-qt stainless steel pot to the 6-ft surgical tubing, every item was well made. The enclosed booklet was also very informative and well produced. I am still getting acquainted with the technique for using this method over the hot water bag type system which emptied more completely. All in all I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: H. Collins

customer_reviews.title: I really like the stainless steal bucket and the quality hose
customer_reviews.text: I really like the stainless steal bucket and the quality hose. I also really liked the really clear instructions and tips included. I really appreciated having soft taper tips, but after three uses, I noticed that the rough cut side opening on the tip was was rubbing my inside a little raw somehow. Other than that, it is a good, quality kit with a travel bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It leaks! Had to seal gasket myself with liquid rubber after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Tina F.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product by Medisential. Its far superior than the previous enema kit I was using, which at the time I thought was pretty good, so I'm quite pleased with the purchase. The noozle goes in and out very effortlessly, almost without sensation, and the clap and 'twist flow adjuster' allow you to control water flow very accurately, and to slow it down to a trickle. Only downside is that its hard to monitor water levels in the bucket because the bucket needs to be elevated for the gravity feed to work, hence, you cannot glance in it without getting up. But overall this is one of the best Amazon purchases I have made in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Dude

customer_reviews.title: Lyme detox
customer_reviews.text: The product was packaged well with good instructions. This is the first time we are using this system to do additional detox. This kit allows one to perform this sort of detox easily. The directions were clear and all the items required worked well. I like the idea of the stainless steel bucket to keep any plastic toxins from being in contact with the body. There are actually enough accessories that two different people could be using the system without needing to share the personal components of the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Michelleoch

customer_reviews.title: product meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from CHIPSA Hospital of Hope in Tijuana and are implementing the coffee enema protocol at home. This bucket & hose works a lot better than the one the hospital provided. The hose is bigger in diameter and I like the clip used to close it off better. The stainless steal bucket is nice but I wish you could see the level of coffee remaining in the bucket. I prefer the metal to the plastic they used at the hospital though. I am able to use this system without assistance so I am more comfortable with the whole process now.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: A garden hose is not necessary!
customer_reviews.text: There is no need for this bucket to have a garden hose sized hose. The tip that it comes with is hard plastic and very uncomfortable. there should definitely be some thing that helps with air as well. Cheaper 1 quart plastic ones have it. You definitely need to do yourself a favor and purchase the long red plastic hose like tip. It is much softer and much safer. I’m giving this 2 stars ⭐️⭐️ ONLY because it is a bucket that holds 2 quarts with a lid. Other than that I am not impressed. Good God - who needs a hose this size???
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cook Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not good water flow. Mess everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Water does not flow properly. Lots of water left in the hose no matter how high or low the bocket it.
customer_reviews.author: juju87

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit, no doubt about it 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, excellent quality and well made. I love how easy it is to clean the bucket. Not sure 🤔 why people would give this product less than ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mafina

customer_reviews.title: Very Reliable & Sterile
customer_reviews.text: This is very effective. It is very sturdy and each component was in the package. I was miserable since a supplement I had started taking made me so constipated. I literally hadn’t gone in almost 3 weeks. This was my last option before going to the hospital- which I really was not looking forward to. Lol Long story short, I did not need to make that embarrassing trip and now I use this kit once per week as maintenance. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dingus Dezigns

customer_reviews.title: It leaks
customer_reviews.text: It leaks from the opening where you connect the tube to the bucket. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY EVER !!!
customer_reviews.text: What I really like about this kit is the lid on the bucket to keep solution warm and spill proof. I like how easy it is to use the tip .. but I find it slips out to easily. My last one was rubber much longer and thinner... but to easy to kink. I love the hook to hang my bucket on... that’s so needed and works well. It’s so convenient to have two shut off valves. The entire kit is top notch sturdy and well made.. Thank you for all the attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great instructions!! Not uncomfortable. Appreciate all the info in the booklet, good and thorough for this newbie. Recommendations for drying the hose between uses would be helpful, but cannot complain one bit about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: A little challenge to assemble but works well
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little bit difficult to take the hose on and off the base of the bucket for cleaning. The valve can also be tricky to use at first, but works after you get the hang of it. The kit does the job. After using, I realize I would prefer a bag I can see through, instead of the tin, to monitor the amount of coffee going in.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Krysiak

customer_reviews.title: Heal Your Body For Free, Drugs Not Needed
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what it's intended. This is the way to health. Clean your bowels out. Dirty insides lead to illness and disease. You clean your outside body, clean the rest of you as well with Fasting and Enemas. These are ancient practises known for thousands of years to heal.
customer_reviews.author: Z.C

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two uses! Very disappointed started leaking at spout.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after only two uses. Started leaking at spout and wouldn’t work at all. I tried two emails to medisential who sells this through Amazon and got no reply! This is going back! I will try a different manufacturer of this type of bucket.
customer_reviews.author: MILLIE

customer_reviews.title: Best Enema Kit available
customer_reviews.text: We tossed our RUBBER enema bag after readying the possible problems with it. We ONLY use this kit now. We HIGHLY recommend it. Easy to clean & use. VERY impressed with it. If enemas are in your daily health regime ... use this one!
customer_reviews.author: Seeking Truth

customer_reviews.title: *** Grateful I FINALLY found a solution***
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because my mother was suffering SEVERE constipation. It was so easy to use and the instructions were straight forward. The many options the kit came with was great. My mother was bedridden and I needed something I could use while she was in the bed. It was the only thing that helped me to get her to have a bowel movement. I would definitely recommend using the enema kit.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Top grade product.
customer_reviews.text: As part of a 21 day detox program, a coffee enema was advised. It was to clean and detox the liver, by way of a coffee enema. this is common for a holistic approach to better health. The product is sincerely top grade. Very easy to assemble and use. Cleaning took extra care, of course, but very easy. I just followed the instructions, which are easy to follow and had no problems at all. It stores easily. It comes with a pouch, so once cleaned and air dried, it can be stored discreetly.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas carol

customer_reviews.title: Good if cared for
customer_reviews.text: Big step up from the bags since I'm allergic to latex which most were. This thing is good and easy to clean except the hose obviously needs to be replaced often which is pricey. The price of this product could be lower but I do like it. I would recommend they make a section translucent so you can see how much is in it. Overall good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clogs easily if your enemas have additives.
customer_reviews.text: We have to use soap, glycerin & salt in our enemas. This causes little particles to form. I had been using a cheap kit from Walmart without any problems. This set, although fancy looking, continually got clogged. It was very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Mushroom

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have had this from the beginning
customer_reviews.text: This kit is so easy to use and very good quality. If you are just starting out, do yourself a favor and invest in this kit. It has everything you need along with instructions so you know how to use it properly. In today's world, you are bombarded with toxins and this is an effective way to remove them from your body.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Logan

customer_reviews.title: Crap happy
customer_reviews.text: I have been having problems with my guts. It was recommended by my doctor to try an enema and see if that helps me to find relief. Needless to say it has helped, a lot. Out of the choices on Amazon I picked this one because with it being a stables steel bucket it is far easier to keep clean than a bag. You can store all of the implements in the bucket as well including the hoses. Very easy to pack up. Everything that came with it is of good quality. First time buying anything like this and I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blotto

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have to be hung, vessel can be placed on flat surface.
customer_reviews.text: The one thing that sets this kit aside from the competition besides the stainless vessel is the awesome follow up and customer service that comes along with the kit. Well made easy to clean, and safe. Also the vessel doesn’t have to be hung, it can be placed on the countertop unlike the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael R.

customer_reviews.title: Do it for your health
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know what I did before I started doing at home enemas and this kit is everything you need for that.. This kind of kit can be intimidating but the instructions are clear and it is very user friendly. Do yourself a favor for your health by this kit you'll thank me later
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Package Deal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! What can I say but it works great, at least with coffee enemas. ☕️ Very thorough instructions and simple to keep clean. I like the bag that it comes with for discreet storage. All in all an excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dena E

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: After receipt and use of this item,Ifeel it to be of great Qaulity.It is made Of High Qaulity Steel,as well as the Tubing for This Product is of very good Qaulity as Well.The price was considerably lower,for very similar Products I saw on line. Lastly,it came with Free Shipping and arrived very Quick to my surprise. I give the Product and The Seller a Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Katz

customer_reviews.title: Great for first timers.
customer_reviews.text: First time using coffee enemas. The instructions were pretty straight forward. I wish it's had measurement levels on the bucket thou. My first two times I didn't get any results, which I found out was because I needed to insert the whole tip. So here I am on my 3rd round (as I type) and crossing my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this enema kit, the quality is very good and I especially like the extra attachment to shut liquids off, it definitely works better than the clamp. Overall I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jesussaves

customer_reviews.title: A sealed product is the most important to me but this was not sealed.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the product because it did not come as a sealed product. The hose attachments did not come in sealed bags. So you do not know if you are getting a new product or used product. Other than that, it is compact as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Diaz

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I really enjoy this product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I really enjoy this product. Initially it took a moment to get the flow correct, but after a few minutes, it worked perfectly. It is easy to clean, use and store. I would highly recommend this product if a person is seeking to include enemas as a part of their health regiment.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good but could improve in an important area
customer_reviews.text: The kit is awesome! The silicone tips (which is all I use) are not great. I totally had to retire my first one after five enemas and I can’t even find a way to connect the sellers. Plus the picture shows that it come with three and mine came with two. If I don’t get a way to connect the seller I will be returning this because it is to expensive to get only 10 uses out of it if one silicone tip lasts five enemas!
customer_reviews.author: A concerned buyer

customer_reviews.title: An open bucket that can be washed
customer_reviews.text: Great for enemas. I like it better than a sealed rubber bag because I can wash it out. I added Prego to it instead of coffee. Helps one get good relief. Easy to add more liquids to while using. Came with a nice fabric storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Blue

customer_reviews.title: Quality and convenience
customer_reviews.text: You can use the bulb that comes with it to get the remainder of fluid from the metal container. So, nothing is wasted except waste. The tubing is excellent, with the irrigation hole on the side, so that it stay clean, unlike the cheap one's where you might get backwash in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, not my first time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve done many kits, I used as directed , no flow. My 6’5’ husband held up... nothing. Exchanged tools, no flow. Soaked and upset after 70 minutes the tube holds the water and no flow. Looks cute does nothing but get your face wet! Used many, this hands down is the worst
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Jett

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The kit arrived one day sooner than expected. Upon opening it, the instructions were clear and allowed me to use it immediately. I felt the health benefits within the hour - lighter feeling, less bloated, "cleaner" - and have been using it daily with ease. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Enema Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is the best one I looked at and then ordered and I am very pleased with it. It has worked very well for me. I would definitely recommend it to others. I like the stainless steel bucket and the instructions were very easy to read and follow. The price was affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Runnergirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality unit, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy unit and tubing, easy to clean, especially with the comprehensive instructions. Comes pre-assembled with mostly everything you might need.
customer_reviews.author: Rando

customer_reviews.title: it still leaks... not sure this is correct, will not tighten and second time,  big mess
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these, seemed like a great idea, instead of using enema bag... ewww Like thought of a “steel bucket”, easy clean and disinfect, however small plastic seal on the bottom and bolt leaks on both units purchased. Has great instruction book for first time user, nice hoses and bag for safe keeping, but leaking is a problem.. will try and seal them and re try again
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ramirez

customer_reviews.text: I use it. Disappointed instructions nor YouTube don’t say or show what all your pieces are or how their all used. No phone number provided either.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: First Timer
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time doing this. It was easy once I got the hang of it. Good quality product. Easy to use, especially the soft tip if you are a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Satvir Bhogal

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The product is great and works exactly as described. The box was damaged and taped upon arrival and the container was scratched but other wise the product was great. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A McD

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I do coffee enemas on a regular basis. I previously had a plastic enema bag but wanted to switch to something less toxic. I love this stainless steel bucket. It's sturdy and also comes with a lid which is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Best. Kit. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little unsure about enemas until receiving this kit and reading the instructions, which were written with great care, I felt confident and understood very well how to proceed ... and now I completely understand the wonderful benefits of this cleansing process!! I'm so thankful I chose THIS kit! It has ALL the equipment and easy to understand instructions that remove and hesitation or trepidation... THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Comes with everything you need to do enema
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had an enema kit before this one. This one comes with everything you need to perform an enema. I’m happy with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: amor_aes

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly great kit if you are wanting to do coffee enemas. Received it the same day I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product...just haven't used it yet :)
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the product yet. The shipping time was great arrived as suggested. All of the material were of good quality and new, never used. I anticipate this will do the job perfectly. I will update after use.
customer_reviews.author: ScholarlyC

customer_reviews.title: great enema kit
customer_reviews.text: this is a great kit. the tubing is high quality, the stainless steel bucket is the perfect size, and the clamps at sturdy. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mohindra Ramphal

customer_reviews.title: High quality unit.
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t used the unit yet , but the physical inspection was very positive. The bucket is very sturdy with a good lid. The hose and attachments are also of high quality. I’m sure it will serve us well.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Schappaugh

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than the rubber bag of the past. Delivered on time. Packaging was intact. A win, all the way around. Plus lots of valuable free info on the website. Your search has ended, buy here. *not being paid*
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Metro

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a super high quality kit and very easy to use. I recommend this over all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Byler

customer_reviews.title: Cleansing measures
customer_reviews.text: I like how well made this system is. You can easily read the booklet having one ready to cleanse and tips of care for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Juile L. Schuett

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy
customer_reviews.text: For a first time user, this kit is affordable and has everything you need (minus the coffee or whatever solution you are going to use). It was simple to use and came with very broad instructions. The different parts could have been slightly better labeled for identification but when examined were easily identified from the descriptions. Super easy to clean and very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: great product one problem
customer_reviews.text: My wife like the coffee enema that came with it, but there is no online ordering to just buy the stuff that goes in the enema. My wife would prefer to stick with this companies product for the refill solution.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Quality products.
customer_reviews.text: Prompt shipment, very pleased with items I ordered. Will order again if needed. Highly recommend this company, I was pleasantly surprised with the free ebook which was very informative.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable nozzle, easy to clean and worth it
customer_reviews.text: The comfort of the tip is amazing. This was hands down the best and most comfortable enema experience I've ever had!!!
customer_reviews.author: Latrina Moore

customer_reviews.title: Spot on till coffee hits the floor
customer_reviews.text: Spot on for a year then it broke. The handle broke off the bucket and coffee went everywhere. Great bucket till that happened.
customer_reviews.author: Shereee Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: High quality, fast shipping, easy to use. Did not receive ebook but, a quick email to the company and I had it the next morning. All around great product that I recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: coastiemama

customer_reviews.title: Essential purchase !!!
customer_reviews.text: The product ease of use and the materials included along with it. Made me even more sure that I purchased the right product. The merchant even made sure that I was pleased with the kit as soon as it was delivered to my door step. You won’t be disappointed by this purchase and the benefits it gives your body.
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Sharp metal where hose attaches to bucket
customer_reviews.text: While cleaning the bucket, my hand was cut from the metal opening where the silicon tube attaches to the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Brent I.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product if you know how to use it
customer_reviews.author: Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Good product quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Easy to use and the manual provided is very helpfull. Arrived earlier than expected. Great service. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Schettini

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm rating this product as a 5 , because it arrived in excellent condition along with clear instructions. The material is awesome. I am extremely satisfied. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use, has a lid so I can move it in my closet, also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Blaylock

customer_reviews.title: Best enema kit ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit... all you need for a coffee or supplements enema. The bulb and the container’s lid (to keep water solution at recommended temperature) are a plus. Would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: makdah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product about 10 times now. Absolutely love it. Easy to use and to clean. The first time I struggled to get the silicone tubing off the bucket. So, I put some olive oil on the valve before putting the tubing the second time and it was way easier to take it off then.
customer_reviews.author: ProBooks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy to clean. Great detox. Just what I was looking for. Highly recommend trying.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were very clear and easy to understand. The steel bucket is high quality. It also comes with a lot of extra pieces like extra nozzles, little wrench for taking apart the bucket. Great product, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Davari

customer_reviews.title: Good deal overall
customer_reviews.text: I like that the item is stainless steel, lots of parts to exchange, some of the parts are not clearly described or given directions on use. The tubing it is not the easiest to clean, it does take some time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Very shoddily made. Not only did it not come with an S hook but after one week, the connection between the hose and the bucket failed and half of the coffee leaks out. Bad for the price
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Nice device
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet but it looks simple enough. Nice design. Comes with a storage bag. Very nice for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: SHA

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We love this product because it is sturdy and well made, and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Darlinda Banda

customer_reviews.title: Quality made kit. Medical grade tubing with several types ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality made kit. Medical grade tubing with several types of tips to choose from. Should be the last kit I ever need as it appears built to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: rvrrat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, comes with everything you need, minus the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Turner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great Enema Kit - everything you need to cleanse your system!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That you can always order replacement parts.
customer_reviews.text: I like the easiness of cleaning the bucket, and refilling it twice if you wanted to. A little disappointed that I didn't get the check valve included in the package. I would definitely recommend this enema system to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Esther morfe

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: This the third time I’m ordering this product and gifting it. What works must be shared with friends. I’m doing just that.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice M. Some

customer_reviews.title: Truly Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! High quality. I’ve been using a crappy (haha) bag Enema kit for years and the entire set up is horrendous. This kit is fantastic quality and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J

customer_reviews.title: very well made product will last for years
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good product works very well for what it was intended easy to carry the lid prevents any spills I intend on using this product for many years money well spent thank you!
customer_reviews.author: good customer

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really quality product. I've had it for just over a week and I'm feeling a little it better every day. The materials are quality and I have no doubt that this will stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy for beginners to get started
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit that comes with a lot of extra goodies...great instructions...I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Toria Posey

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It has changed my enema routine greatly. Had a bag enema kit. This new kit is awsome!!
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: All & everything you might need for enema's
customer_reviews.text: It exceeded my expectations down to explanations to the different types of cleansing.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really like the quality and ease of use. Great customer support as well.

product_meta.title: Medisential Enema Kit - Suitable for Coffee, Water and Gerson Therapy - Stainless Steel Bucket - Large for Home Use - Relaxing and Comfortable to Use - with Full Instructions Manual & Enema Bulb
feature_bullets: ✅ HIGH QUALITY REUSABLE ENEMA KIT: Comes with a 2 quart stainless steel enema bucket with silicone lid, thick 6.5ft silicone tubing, a silicone enema bulb, and a set of comfortable, pain free washable tips. That means no leakages, no mess, and a kit that lasts.

✅ COMFORTABLE AND EASY TO USE: We know that many people are nervous about the idea of an enema, so we’ve created the most comfortable and easiest to use enema kit on the market. You’ll be surprised at how simple it is, and the super soft enema tips make it incredibly comfortable too.

✅ NON-TOXIC AND ODOR FREE: This kit is made from 100% non-toxic odorless materials. Everything, from the premium enema bucket, PVC tips, tubing and enema bulb are BPA and phthalates free, and is completely safe for the human body. So you can forget about the strong plastic rubbery smell you get from older kits.

✅ COMES WITH FULL INSTRUCTIONS GUIDE: Never given yourself an enema before? This kit comes with comprehensive instructions and a detailed guide, so you can learn everything you need to know about performing the enema procedure with comfort and ease.

✅ 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We’re confident that you’ll consider this the most well made, easiest to use and most comfortable enema kit that you’ve ever come across. If you disagree, then we’ll be more than happy to give you every penny of your money back. Try it risk free today.
